subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Hockey, Field
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s field hockey team is headed to the Beijing Olympics after defeating Belgium, 3-1, on Sunday in the final of the qualifying tournament in Kazan, Russia. Kayla Bashore, Tiffany Snow and Kate Barber scored for the Americans.
snippet: The United States women’s field hockey team is headed to the Beijing Olympics after defeating Belgium, 3-1, on Sunday in the final of the qualifying tournament in Kazan, Russia. Kayla Bashore, Tiffany Snow and Kate Barber scored for the Americans.
